description.narrative: The development objective of the proposed project is consistent with the PDO for the CAB Program: To contribute to increase geographical reach and usage of regional broadband network services and reduce their prices in the territory of São Tomé and Príncipe.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, A.2 | Description :The Recipient shall appoint and thereafter maintain until the end ofthe second year of Project implementation, a technical adviserto the MoPWNR | Due Date :06-Oct-2011

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, A.3 | Description :The Recipient, through the MoFIC shall establish and, thereaftermaintain throughout Project implementation, a Project steering committe | Due Date :06-Oct-2011

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, C. | Description :The Recipient shall have its Financial Statements audited in accordancewith the provisions of Section 4.09 (b) of the General Conditions. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, C. | Description :The Recipient shall prepare and furnish to the Association, interimunaudited financial reports for the Project covering the quarter | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, G. | Description :The Recipient shall distribute the bidding documents inviting bids fora second global license to operate in the Recipient#s territory, including at least partial divestiture of the Recipient | Due Date:06-Jan-2012
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, G. | Description :The Recipient shall: acquire an accounting software for the Project;and recruit an external auditor for AFAP. | Due Date :06-Oct-2011

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II, B | Description :The Recipient shall prepare a report integrating the results of themonitoring and evaluation activities at midterm to be reviewed during the review | Due Date :28-Feb-2013
